question:
A restaurant has placed an advertisement for waiters and waitresses in your local newspaper.

Write a letter to the restaurant, applying for the job. In your letter:

explain what you are currently doing
describe your suitability for this area of work
say when you can attend an interview
You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.

You should write at least 150 words.
text: I  am  writing to you with regards  to the  job  advertisementpostedfor a waiterpositionwhich I  came  across  in  the  local  newspaper.  I  am  really  interested  in  the position and I believe I would be very suitable for this type of work.

I  am  currently  studying a  Bachelor  of computer  engineering  at  the  University  of McGill and I’m a freshman. I’m studying full time at the moment and considering doing a side job to partially cover my expenses.Growing  up  in  a  small  town, Since  8th  grade, I’veworked  on  and  offin  various restaurants  as  a  waitress.  My  first  job was  as  a waitress in  a  small  local  family restaurant near my home when I was 15. Afterwards, I worked in various medium to larger restaurants  as  a waitress and  therefore  have  plenty  of  experience  in  this area.
I am available for interview at any timethis weekin theafternoons. You could reach me either by my email or phone number. I am attaching my resume for reference.
I am looking forward to hearing from you soon,
